title: Customer_360
description: Customer data from various sources, enabling a holistic view of customers.

table.title: customers
table.description: Contains customer information, including customer_index, name, contact details, and other relevant attributes.

table.title: stores
table.description: Provides data about various stores, including store_index, location, and store attributes.

table.title: products
table.description: Contains details of different products, including product_index, name, description, and product attributes.

table.title: transactions
table.description: Holds transaction data, including transaction_index, transaction_date, transaction_line_item, and transaction details.

workflow.title: Customer_360 wrokflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing customer data

lens.name: Customer Insights Lens
lens.description: Provides insights into customer behavior and preferences.
